p: Regarding food security, there are many indicators for its measurement ( Gil et al., 2019). For example, the Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) mainly uses two indicators on hunger and food insecurity. These two indicators are the Prevalence of Undernourishment (PoU) and the Prevalence of Food Insecurity as measured through the Food Insecurity Experience Scale (FIES) ( FAO, 2017). Regardless of the type of index calculated, the result is always the same: disasters like pandemics harm food security and expand poverty ( FAO, 2016, 2021) and this pandemic is no exception ( Laborde et al., 2020).
